body: someone know if this series is translate?
Thank you @NaruOtsutuski.  Now that I look carefully and after reading your comment I came to a conclusion that you're right. I apologize for my inconvenience.

@Ducket more like a swap-mother story. But for whatever reason in the end the two mother choose one son (maybe the other son died or was transferred in another country, or they just decided to leave the other one in the dust).
Seems like some ntr shit .So need English confirmation.
